data.text: I was in Barcelona for workacation. Working  remotely and traveling alone. I stayed in the hostel for more than one week. I was kind of new into travailing alone so I booked a room for only women. I kind of liked it. It was a room with six beds all of the women were very friendly and kind. I also make a lot of friends. The room was on the corner, very bright and noisy, sometimes we could hear some luggage rolling on the streets. During the week you also can hear the kinds from the school. This was fine for me, because I get up very early. The reception was very helpful 24h and very friendly. I talk a lot with all the working people. They also have toweled, if you need one for a little amount. The sheets in the room was clean, the room was clean. You have your own locker. I really enjoyed the sweet breakfast and the coffee in the morning. The area was nice close to the estation nord so if you need to get a train also nice.
data.title: Great stay and breakfast

data.text:
It was really good experience to stay in there. Stuff was awasome, everywhere was super clean and the price was rewarding specially after seeing how nice is the hostel
. Subway is 5 mins away by walk and you can reach any point you want from hostel. There are lot of markets around it so its not hard to find something to eat or bring with. So, you may make a choice to stay in this place without any doubt!
data.title: Excellent

data.text: Good place for the money. Clean and efficient. Not very close to the centre . The staff were very helpful. The showers were clean but tiny so you need to make sure you don't take anything you want to keep dry into the cubicle. The common area is comfortable and if you want to bring food and cook your own meal there is a cooker and microwave. The Breakfast was OK.   There are shops nearby to get food and the Metro is close enough if you want to get anywhere. Overall I would say it was adequate.
data.title: Good value for money

data.text:
It was clean, we could communicate very easy with the staff, they were friendly and polite. 24h reception. Comfortable beds, with atomic light and plug.
Good breakfast (coffee, tea, soya milk and regular, juices: orange, apple, pineapple, coconut, atomic cakes, toast bread, jams). 
Affordable for the whole package.

 But: 
There was too much cold in the room (because of the automatic air-condition) even during the night. I was waking up with headache and throat pain. *After my request they turned off the A/C for the night. 
The lights in the room were operated by sensor after 18-19pm until 23pm. That means that if you are trying to sleep, and there is also another person in the room who is moving, the lights are constantly on-off. 
No cheese or jamon at the breakfast.
data.title: Very good

data.text: Stayed here for one night as our flights got changed to a day earlier and we needed somewhere to stay. Was very clean for the most part however my boyfriend saw a cockroach running through the showers. Breakfast was okay (bread, cereal, little muffins, juice, coffee). Would say very good for backpackers but not quite my cup of tea! Mattress was a sort of blue plastic material so very loud when moving around in the night. Staff were very friendly and provide locks for the lockers if you donâ€™t have one, for a deposit which you get back when handing them back upon leaving.
data.title: Okay
